import "../library-view.css"; import React, { useContext } from "react"; import Modal from "react-bootstrap/Modal"; import { Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { IndicatorContext } from "../indicators"; import Draggable from "react-draggable"; const Actions = (props) => { const [element, setElement] = useContext(IndicatorContext); return ( <> {element === undefined ? ( " " ) : ( {element.title}
Name setElement({ ...element, title: e.target.value }) } name="title" value={element.title} required />
